jonnoalcaro.comment: This is not something I would normally do but I'm going to go ahead and approve this motion because I know there's some urgency here. And I just want it to move forward. So my vote is yes.

katrinacallsen.comment: The conversation has centered around whether to pass a motion regarding the use of funds from the American Rescue Plan Act.  As someone who believes strongly in supporting students with disabilities, I am voting yes on this motion.
